# UIWritingToolsCoordinator.ContextScope.fullDocument

**Case**

An option to provide all of your view’s text.

## Declaration

```swift
case fullDocument
```

## Discussion

With this option, include all of the text your view manages. If your view has multiple text storage objects, create a separate context object for each one.

## Getting the scope

- **UIWritingToolsCoordinator.ContextScope.userSelection**: An option to provide only the view’s currently selected text.
- **UIWritingToolsCoordinator.ContextScope.visibleArea**: An option to provide only the text in the currently visible portion of your view.
